participant_1.background:
I used to play with animals, but now I'm too busy with my work.
I would brag about being a good father and making my family happy.
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.

participant_2.background:
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.
I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind
i wait tables.
the only autographs i have ever wanted are from authors.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm a stay at home mom to my two daughters.
That's great! I am a father as well. I also have two daughters.
That's so cool! I'm glad you're a father.
Thanks, I'm glad I'm a father too. My daughters are my best friends.
I'm sure they are. What do you like to do with your daughters?
We like to play games, go to the park, and read books together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure they love spending time with you.
They do! I love spending time with them.
I'm glad to hear that. Are you interested in reading any of the Harry Potter books?
I've actually read them all! I love Harry Potter!
That's great! I'm a huge fan of Harry Potter too.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone else who loves Harry Potter.
Me too! We should talk more about Harry Potter sometime.
